ocean.question: I have a shell and live in the sea. I'm slow but I carry my home with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I move very slowly.
🏠 I have a hard covering that protects me.
🥗 Sometimes people eat me in salads!

ocean.question: I'm a very big mammal that swims in the sea. I make a 'click' noise and swim so free. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am bigger than a car!
🔈 I use sounds to find my way.
🫧 I need to come up to the surface to breathe.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live under the sea. I can squirt ink to get away from thee. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I don't have bones.
🖤 I can change colors to hide!
🖐 I have many arms to grab things!

ocean.question: I am a large body of salty water. I cover most of the Earth and have many creatures living in me. What am I?

hints.text: ⛵️ Boats sail on me.
🏖 You can find beaches next to me.
🧂 I am very salty!

ocean.question: I’m a fish with a very flat body. Both of my eyes are on the same side, isn't that oddy?

hints.text: 〰️ I live on the bottom of the ocean.
🎨 I can blend in really well.
🍳 My shape is similar to a type of food.

ocean.question: I'm a plant in the ocean that many animals eat, providing them food and sometimes a treat. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 Some people eat me too!
🪴 I grow under water.
🐠 Fish like to hide in me.

ocean.question: I'm a creature that looks like a star, but I live in the sea and am not very far from the bottom. What am I?

hints.text: ⭐ I am shaped like a star.
🖐 I have five arms.
🪨 I like to stick to rocks.

ocean.question: I am a very strong, powerful movement of water that is caused by the moon. What am I?

hints.text: ⬆️ Sometimes I make the water higher.
⬇️ Sometimes I make the water lower.
🌕 The moon pulls on me.

ocean.question: I am a place where the ocean meets the land. You can build castles on me with sand. What am I?

hints.text: ⛱️ People go to me to relax.
🌊 The ocean waves crash on me.
☀️ You can get a tan on me.

ocean.question: I am a large group of coral that many sea creatures call home. I am very colorful and important to the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I am like a city under the sea.
🐠 Many different fish live here.
💎 I am very fragile and should be protected.
